hero.title: Grow Smarter,
hero.subtitle: Farm Better
hero.description: Your one-stop platform for modern farming solutions, connecting you with the tools, knowledge, and community you need to thrive.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive farming solutions designed to enhance your agricultural success

droneSpray.title: Drone Spray
droneSpray.description: Precision agriculture with automated drone spraying services for efficient crop management.

machineryStorage.title: Machinery & Storage
machineryStorage.description: Access modern farming equipment without the heavy investment. Rent what you need, when you need it.

veterinaryHelp.title: Veterinary Help
veterinaryHelp.description: Professional veterinary care for your livestock, ensuring their health and productivity.

livestockDisease.title: Livestock Disease Prediction
livestockDisease.description: AI-powered early warning system for livestock diseases, helping you protect your animals.

expert.title: Expert Consultation
expert.description: Connect with agricultural experts for personalized guidance and problem-solving.

cropPrices.title: Crop Prices
cropPrices.description: Stay updated with real-time market prices and trends for better decision making.

chatbot.title: Chat with Gramin Sathi
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm Gramin Sathi, your farming assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.greeting1: Hello! How can I assist you with farming today?
responses.greeting2: Hi there! Welcome to FarmHub. What can I help you with?
responses.greeting3: Namaste! I'm here to help with your farming needs.
responses.default1: I understand. Let me connect you with an expert who can help you better.
responses.default2: That's a great question. Would you like to speak with a specialist about this?
responses.default3: I can help you with that. Would you like to know more about our services?

footer.description: Empowering farmers with modern solutions and technology for sustainable agriculture.
